snippet: Mr. Kaine's campaign announced this week it had raised $2.2 million in the first three months of this year, compared with the $1.4 million his competitor, former Gov. George Allen, announced he raised.
abstract: Mr. Kaine's campaign announced this week it had raised $2.2 million in the first three months of this year, compared with the $1.4 million his competitor, former Gov. George Allen, announced he raised.

headline.main: In Virginia, Kaine Jumps to Substantial Fund-Raising Lead
